edu.utsa.cs4953.abacus
Enum Mode

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Mode>
      edu.utsa.cs4953.abacus.Mode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Mode>
public enum Mode
extends java.lang.Enum<Mode>

Determines whether the board is in split-board mode or normal mode.

Enum Constant Summary
NORMAL
          Normal abacus operating mode.
SPLIT
          Special split mode used for multiplication, square roots, etc.

          The window width in pixels.
